ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:17:17 [Issue ID 4000-139960] urn:comicvine:4000-139960 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:34:53. [Issue ID 352966]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Various short satires of pop culture.
Inbanana and company bumble throught the jungle to his marriage.
Things that can go wrong with summer fun.
Parody strips in the style of Cathy.
A month in the life of Tad, as he finds and cares for a lost dog.
Two strips. In the first, the Black Spy is captured by a rocket he attempts to steal from the White Spy. In the second, the White Spy is attacked by a bird that was disguised as the Black Spy.
A fake ad for a music CD.
A phone company erects a cell tower in Monroe's yard and gives the family top-of-the-line phones as payment. As usual, Monroe has a great time for awhile until everything falls apart.
Extreme examples of funeral homes' money-saving efforts.
Several gags on travel subjects.
The children and Prince Thespian defeat the forces of King MyAss.
ComicInfo.Tags: Steve Jobs,Grumpy,Barack Obama,Amy Winehouse,Hägar the Horrible,Indiana Jones,Calvin,Aslan,Mutt Williams,Professor Oxley,White Spy,Irina Spalko,Monroe,Alfred E. Neuman,Jack Black,Marion Ravenwood,Black Spy,E. T.
ComicInfo.Title: Random Samplings of Reader Mail; The Fundalini Pages; Inadiaper Jones and the Kingdom of the Creative Dry Spell; A Mad Look At Summer Fun; Amy; Planet TAD!!!!!; Spy Vs. Spy; In Stores This Week!; Monroe and...The New Phone; When The Recession Hits Funeral Homes; MAD Heads For The Hills Outtakes; The MAD World of Travel; The Chronic-Ills of Yawnia Prince Thespian; Drawn-Out Dramas
ComicInfo.Writer: John Ficarra,Dick DeBartolo,Jacob Lambert,Arnie Kogen,Sergio Aragonés,Tim Carvell,Peter Kuper,Darren Johnson,Anthony Barbieri,Teresa Burns Parkhurst,Stan Sinberg
